**MODIFY PRIOR EXECUTION**
postman api entry
https://developer.uber.com/docs/payments/references/testing/postman-collections

1. Select in Postman the Environment your just imported.

2. Fill in the CURRENT VALUE of variables CLIENT_ID and CLIENT_SECRET with the strings in your Uber Developer account.

3. Send the request “1. Generate Bearer Token”.

4. Copy the value for “access_token” from the response into the CURRENT VALUE of variable “BEARER_TOKEN” in the Environment.

5. Fill in the CURRENT_VALUE of variables PARTNER_ID and PARTNER_SOURCE_ACCOUNT_ID of the environment, using the IDs provided by Uber.

6. Update other variables accordingly (FUNDING_METHOD, CURRENCY, COUNTRY_ISO2, LOCALE).

Now, you’re all set to start sending requests. Make sure to read the descriptions on the requests and follow the documentation.


v1.0
https://app.getpostman.com/run-collection/7414c10ca05d6e301624#?env%5BPartner%20Sandbox%20Environment%
